text: A fo, gumazir kam bar fofozir aghuiba ko nɨghnɨzir aghuiba iti, egha irebabar mɨngariba ko akar isɨn zuiba, ko bizir mogomebar mɨngaribar gun mɨgei. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ Daniel bagh akam amadagh. Atrivim Nebukatnesar ziam Beltesasar a gatɨ. Nɨ a mɨkemeghtɨ a izɨ akar bɨrimɨn itimɨn mɨngarimɨn gun nɨ mɨkɨmam.”
